content:
Hi Guys...,

What's the best way to access Webform Submission fields in Views?

Update...
Found it... relationship: Webform Submissions.

Hmmm... I have two submissions and the view is showing ten :frown: and I can't filter on a submission field :frown:

Any clues how I can get around this please?

Thanks in advance.
There‘s an option „query settings“ or similar in Views, whre you can hide duplicates.
The option is in the "Other" section on the right-hand side, and the setting is "Distinct."

mazze.ch said:

There‘s an option „query settings“ or similar in Views, whre you can hide duplicates.

Many thanks for your reply...

Tried both areas, Use aggregation and Query settings (Distinct and pure distinct) :frown:

Fudged it for now... there aren't that many submissions so I will manually add them to a custom content type.
Is there a field that is returning multiple values?
